name: Death's Day Off
description:
Death may sound like this ominous and scary entity, but are you really sure?

play as a fallen soul, and meet the reaper in first hand, unless it's his day off, then maybe you may have a chance...

explore a house with many possibilites.

25 unique items and craftables with over 30 different endings, and random dialogues. 

please read readme file before playing the game.
